# wideRhino

<img src="logo.png" align="right" width="150" /> 

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of wideRhino is to create a CVA biplot through the GSVD for data with large p. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of wideRhino from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("RaeesaGaney91/wideRhino")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(wideRhino)
## basic example code
```
